title: 50K Benghazi’s, LITERAL Handmaids 9.23.20
itunes:title: 50K Benghazi’s, LITERAL Handmaids 9.23.20
description:
In episode 721, Jack and Miles are joined by Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend's Alison Rosen to discuss the Supreme Court justice seat and the People of Praise, Covid-19 deaths, foods that changed when we weren't looking, the junk food industry taking advantage of the pandemic, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Toomey, swing state Republican, supports Senate moving on Trump Supreme Court nominee
  2. How Charismatic Catholic Groups Like Amy Coney Barrett's People of Praise Inspired 'The Handmaid's Tale'
  3. 50,000 Benghazis, 109 Katrinas: U.S. COVID-19 Death in Perspective
  4. What Do 200,000 Deaths Add Up To?
  5. Oh, fine, General Mills will make its cereal tasty just this once
  6. Bananas looked totally different in the 1940s — before disaster struck
  7. SIGNALLING VIRTUE, PROMOTING HARM: Unhealthy commodity industries and COVID-19
  8. How soda impacts diabetes risk
  9. How COVID-19 Impacts People with Diabetes
  10. Why COVID-19 is more deadly in people with obesity—even if they’re young
  11. WATCH: El. Train - Lemon (El. Train Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
